game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to believe that the lost artifact is hidden within an abandoned ruin. Retrieve it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magic ring

task.description: Make your way to the coordinates marked on the map where the ruins are believed to be located.
Search for any clues or signs of the artifact while navigating through the dangerous traps and puzzles within.
